column1: There was a large turnout at the venue.
The event started at 6 PM as scheduled.
Poor planning ruined the entire experience for everyone.
Absolutely disorganized and stressful from start to finish.
The event was a total disaster, nothing was organized.
The staff were very friendly and helpful.
It was completely mismanaged and chaotic throughout.
Total mess, everything went wrong at the event.
Snacks were available at the stalls.
